item.title: Netflix 传播主管和全球公共政策高管离职
item.description: Netflix 周二表示，全球公共政策副总裁迪安-加菲尔德（Dean Garfield）和首席传播官蕾切尔-韦特斯通（Rachel Whetstone）将离开公司。【原文：Netflix said on Tuesday that Vice President of Global Public Policy Dean Garfield, and Chief Communications Officer Rachel Whetstone are leaving the company.】

item.title: 投资者因伪造盖蒂图片公司 40 亿美元收购要约被判入狱
item.description: 本周二，几家上市公司的前首席执行官被判处 10 个月监禁，他承认曾向盖蒂图片控股公司发起价值 40 亿美元的虚假收购要约，以人为抬高这家视觉媒体公司的股价。【原文：A former CEO of several publicly traded companies was sentenced on Tuesday to 10 months in prison after admitting he launched a fake $4 billion takeover bid for Getty Images Holdings to artificially inflate the visual media company's stock price.】

item.title: 特别报道：在英特尔内部，首席执行官帕特-盖尔辛格（Pat Gelsinger）摸索着复兴美国偶像的道路
item.description: 英特尔与台湾台积电达成了一项甜蜜的协议，由台积电生产英特尔设计但无法生产的芯片。消息人士称，台积电为英特尔提供了很高的折扣。【原文：Intel had a sweet deal going with Taiwan’s TSMC, who would make chips that Intel designed but could not produce. And it was offering deep discounts to Intel, sources say.】

item.title: 监督机构指控波音公司向空军多收了近 8000% 的肥皂分配器费用
item.description: 据五角大楼监督机构的一份报告称，波音公司向美国空军多收了 C-17 运输机备件的费用，包括将肥皂分配器的价格抬高了 7943%。【原文：Boeing overcharged the U.S. Air Force for spare parts for C-17 transport planes, including marking up the price on soap dispensers by 7,943%, according to a report by a Pentagon watchdog.】

item.title: 全球需求疲软，Moncler 第三季度销售额下滑 3
item.description: 意大利奢侈服饰制造商 Moncler 第三季度收入按固定汇率计算下降了 3%，略高于分析师的预期，所有主要市场均出现疲软。【原文：Revenues at Italian luxury outwear maker Moncler fell 3% at constant exchange rates in the third quarter, slightly more than analysts had anticipated, with weakness spread across all its main markets.】

item.title: 欧盟对中国电动汽车征收关税，中国政府面临报复风险
item.description: 欧盟决定对中国制造的电动汽车加征高达 45.3% 的关税，这是该调查中最受瞩目的一次。【原文：The European Union has decided to increase tariffs on Chinese-built electric vehicles to as much as 45.3% at the end of its highest profile investigation that has divided Europe and prompted retaliation from Beijing.】

item.title: 独家报道：OpenAI 与博通和台积电合作打造首款芯片，缩小代工规模
item.description: 消息人士告诉路透社，OpenAI 正在与博通（Broadcom）和台积电（TSMC）合作，打造其首款内部芯片，旨在支持其人工智能系统，同时增加 AMD 芯片和英伟达（Nvidia）芯片，以满足其激增的基础设施需求。【原文：OpenAI is working with Broadcom and TSMC to build its first in-house chip designed to support its artificial intelligence systems, while adding AMD chips alongside Nvidia chips to meet its surging infrastructure demands, sources told Reuters.】

item.title: 高盛和摩根士丹利首席执行官认为 2025 年将有更多交易发生
item.description: 高盛（Goldman Sachs）和摩根士丹利（Morgan Stanley）的首席执行官周二表示，他们预计企业交易将在 2025 年回升，而阿波罗全球管理公司（Apollo Global Management）的首席执行官则表示，他预计唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）赢得总统大选将刺激更多的交易。【原文：The CEOs of Goldman Sachs and Morgan Stanley said on Tuesday they expected corporate dealmaking to pick up in 2025, while the CEO of Apollo Global Management said he expected a presidential victory by Donald Trump would spur more deals.】

item.title: 美联储将在未来两次会议上降息 25 个基点：路透调查
item.description: 路透社调查显示，所有111位经济学家都认为美国联邦储备委员会将于11月7日将其关键利率下调25个基点，超过90%的多数经济学家预测12月将再次下调四分之一个百分点。【原文：The U.S. Federal Reserve will cut its key interest rate by 25 basis points on Nov. 7, according to all 111 economists in a Reuters poll, with more than a 90% majority predicting another quarter-percentage-point move in December.】

item.title: 墨西哥石油公司第三季度亏损 1,613 亿比索
item.description: 墨西哥国有石油公司 Pemex 周二向墨西哥证券交易所提交的文件显示，该公司第三季度净亏损 1,613 亿比索。【原文：Mexican state-owned oil company Pemex reported a 161.3 billion peso third-quarter net loss on Tuesday, according to a filing with the Mexican stock exchange.】

item.title: 美联储有望在 11 月和 12 月降息四分之一个百分点
item.description: 交易员周二押注，美联储决策者几乎肯定会在下周将短期借贷成本下调四分之一个百分点，因为美国劳工部的一份报告显示，上个月的职位空缺降至2021年1月以来的最低点。【原文：Federal Reserve policymakers are nearly certain to deliver a quarter-point reduction in short-term borrowing costs next week, traders bet on Tuesday, as a U.S. Labor Department report showed job openings dropped last month to their lowest since January 2021.】

item.title: 阿根廷债务风险指数再次下降，违约担忧减弱
item.description: 由于投资者越来越看好亲市场的自由派总统哈维尔-米莱伊，阿根廷的国家风险指数（衡量投资者要求持有当地债券相对于等值美债的溢价）周二下跌了不到900个基点。【原文：Argentina's country risk index , a measure of the premium investors demand to hold local bonds versus equivalent U.S. debt, dropped under 900 basis points on Tuesday as investors grow more bullish on pro-market libertarian President Javier Milei.】

item.title: 美国 10 月份消费者信心指数回升
item.description: 由于对劳动力市场的看法有所改善，10月份美国消费者信心指数升至9个月来的最高点。【原文：U.S. consumer confidence increased to a nine-month high in October amid improved perceptions of the labor market.】

item.title: 美国 9 月职位空缺降至逾 3 年半低点
item.description: 美国 9 月份的职位空缺降至逾 3 年半以来的最低水平，上个月的数据也被下调，这表明劳动力市场状况大幅放缓。【原文：U.S. job openings fell to the lowest level in more than 3-1/2 years in September and data for the prior month was revised down, pointing to a considerable easing in labor market conditions.】

item.title: 大众汽车旗下奥迪与潜在投资者洽谈布鲁塞尔生产基地事宜
item.description: 大众汽车公司发言人周二表示，该公司的豪华车部门奥迪正在就其陷入困境的布鲁塞尔工厂与潜在投资者进行谈判。【原文：Volkswagen's luxury division Audi is in talks with a potential investor for its struggling Brussels plant, a company spokesperson said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 廉价航空公司边疆航空第三季度亏损超预期，股价下跌
item.description: 本周二，廉价航空公司边疆航空公司（Frontier Airlines）的母公司边疆集团（Frontier Group）公布的第三季度财报显示，由于国内航线运力过剩，该公司上半年的收入受到影响，第三季度的亏损额大于预期。【原文：Frontier Group , the parent of budget carrier Frontier Airlines, reported a bigger-than-expected loss in the third quarter on Tuesday, as overcapacity on domestic routes hit its revenue in the first half of the period.】

item.title: 欧洲汽车安全机构冷落比亚迪 Atto 3 驾驶辅助系统
item.description: 欧洲汽车安全机构对比亚迪 Atto 3 电动车所使用的驾驶辅助系统作出了 "不推荐 "评级，这对正在努力拓展欧洲市场的中国汽车制造商来说是一个打击。【原文：Europe's car safety agency has issued a "not recommended" rating to the driver assistance system used in BYD's Atto 3 EV, dealing a blow to the Chinese automaker as it strives to expand on the continent.】

item.title: 食品供应商 Sysco 因需求稳定，季度销售额超出预期
item.description: 食品分销商 Sysco 公司周二公布的第一季度营收超出预期，主要得益于其特色海鲜和鲜切肉类产品的稳定需求，但利润未达预期。【原文：Food distributor Sysco Corp beat first-quarter revenue estimates on Tuesday, helped by steady demand for its specialty seafood and fresh-cut meat products, but missed profit expectations.】

item.title: 美国 8 月份月度房价进一步上涨
item.description: 8 月份，美国独户住宅价格上涨，但供应依然紧张，加之抵押贷款利率升高，使潜在购房者仍持观望态度。【原文：U.S. single-family home prices increased in August amid still tight supply, which together with elevated mortgage rates continue to keep prospective buyers on the sidelines.】

item.title: Lucid 下周开始接受 Gravity 电动 SUV 订单
item.description: 电动汽车制造商Lucid集团周二表示，将于11月7日开始接受其Gravity SUV的订单，以刺激需求并吸引更广泛的客户。【原文：Electric-vehicle maker Lucid Group said on Tuesday it will open orders for its Gravity SUV on Nov. 7, as it looks to drum up demand and attract a wider swathe of customers.】

item.title: 美国 9 月商品贸易逆差因进口而急剧扩大
item.description: 由于进口激增，9 月份美国货物贸易逆差急剧扩大，这表明贸易仍然拖累了第三季度的经济增长。【原文：The U.S. trade deficit in goods widened sharply in September amid a surge in imports, suggesting that trade remained a drag on economic growth in the third quarter.】

item.title: 捷蓝航空全年收入预期低于预期，股价下跌
item.description: 捷蓝航空公司（JetBlue Airways）预计，由于美国大选在即，国内旅游需求放缓，2024 年的收入降幅将超过预期，导致其股价在周二收盘前下跌 4.5%。【原文：JetBlue Airways forecast a bigger-than-expected fall in 2024 revenue amid a moderation in domestic travel demand ahead of the upcoming U.S. elections, sending its shares down 4.5% before the bell on Tuesday.】

item.title: 康宁公司因光纤需求强劲而预测季度业绩乐观
item.description: 大猩猩玻璃制造商康宁公司周二公布的第四季度利润预期超出预期，原因是网络数据消耗量（包括用于生成式人工智能模型训练的数据消耗量）不断增加，对其光纤产品的需求也持续增加。【原文：Gorilla Glass maker Corning fourth-quarter profit forecast beat estimates on Tuesday, as rising consumption of data over networks, including for generative AI model training, continues to increase demand for its optical fiber products.】

item.title: D.R. Horton 2025 年收入和房屋交付量低于预期，股价下跌
item.description: 周四，D.R. Horton 预测 2025 年的收入和房屋交付量均低于预期，原因是抵押贷款利率的波动使一些购房者保持观望，而该建筑商保留了折扣以刺激需求。【原文：D.R. Horton forecast 2025 revenue and home deliveries below estimates on Thursday, as mortgage rate volatility kept some home buyers on the sidelines and the builder retained discounts to whip up demand.】

item.title: 阿布扎比的 CYVN Holdings 就收购迈凯轮汽车业务达成非约束性协议
item.description: 两家海湾公司周二表示，总部位于阿布扎比的投资公司 CYVN Holdings 已达成一项非约束性协议，将从巴林主权财富基金 Mumtalakat 手中收购汽车制造商迈凯轮汽车业务 100% 的股份。【原文：Abu Dhabi-based investment vehicle CYVN Holdings has entered a non-binding agreement to buy 100% of carmaker McLaren's automotive business from Mumtalakat, the sovereign wealth fund of Bahrain, the two Gulf firms said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 莱多斯公司因国防需求强劲而上调年度预测
item.description: 美国国防承包商莱多斯控股公司（Leidos Holdings）周二上调了年度利润和收入预期，认为在地缘政治局势日益紧张的情况下，全球武器需求将保持强劲。【原文：U.S. defense contractor Leidos Holdings raised its annual profit and revenue forecasts on Tuesday, banking on strong worldwide weapons demand amid growing geopolitical tensions.】

item.title: 金融产品需求增加，MSCI 第三季度利润强劲
item.description: 指数提供商摩根斯坦利资本国际公司（MSCI）周二发布报告称，由于对其产品和服务的需求强劲，公司第三季度利润有所增长。【原文：Index provider MSCI on Tuesday reported a rise in its third-quarter profit helped by robust demand for its products and services.】

item.title: 由于燃料需求疲软，炼油商菲利普斯 66 公布第三季度利润下降
item.description: 菲利普斯 66 周二公布的季度利润下降，原因是燃料需求低迷导致利润率下滑。【原文：Phillips 66 posted a fall in quarterly profit on Tuesday, hurt by a slump in margins due to lackluster fuel demand.】

item.title: 需求低迷，麦当劳全球销售额降幅超预期
item.description: 麦当劳周二公布的季度全球可比销售额降幅超过预期，主要市场的客流量疲软对其造成了影响，尽管麦当劳在数年涨价后加大了促销力度以吸引顾客。【原文：McDonald's on Tuesday posted a steeper-than-expected drop in quarterly global comparable sales, hurt by weaker traffic across its key markets even as it intensified promotions to woo back customers after several years of price hikes.】

item.title: PayPal 预计第四季度营收低于预期，利润增长乏力
item.description: 周二，PayPal 预测第四季度营收低于预期，原因是这家数字支付公司将重点从积极扩张转向利润率更高的业务，导致其股价在开盘前下跌 6.6%。【原文：PayPal forecast fourth-quarter revenue below estimates on Tuesday as the digital payments company shifts its focus to higher-margin businesses from aggressive expansion, sending its shares down 6.6% before the market open.】
